metadata.inclusion:
1. Press and hold the Inclusion/Exclusion button for 5 seconds.
2. The LED will turn on after 5 seconds.
3. Release the button to start inclusion for 30 seconds.
4. The LED will blink 3 times if inclusion is successful.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Press and hold the Inclusion/Exclusion button for 5 seconds.
2. The LED will turn on after 5 seconds.
3. Release the button to start exclusion.
4. The LED will blink 3 times if exclusion is successful.
metadata.reset:
1. Press and hold the Inclusion/Exclusion button for 10 seconds.
2. The LED will blink while holding the button.
3. Release the button to start factory reset.
4. The LED will blink 5 times when reset is complete.
